name: Discount Auto Repair & Tires of Boca Raton
description: Discount Auto Repair & Tires of Boca Raton provides affordable, reliable auto repair and tire services. Our experienced mechanics use quality parts and the latest tools to get you back on the road quickly.

review.reviewBody: Fixed my brakes fast and cheap! The staff was friendly and explained everything to me. Will definitely return for future repairs.
I've been going to Discount Auto for years. Their prices are fair and the work is always done right. Highly recommended!

itemOffered.name: Oil Change Service
itemOffered.description: Quick, professional oil changes using high-quality oils and filters to keep your engine running smoothly.

itemOffered.name: Tire Replacement
itemOffered.description: Wide selection of new tires from top brands with expert installation and balancing included.

itemOffered.name: Brake Repair
itemOffered.description: Comprehensive brake services including pad replacement, rotor resurfacing, and complete system inspection.
